function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High turn-over and customer density models in stores and hospitality venues","Impact":"Increased risk of community transmission due to crowded spaces","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing rules, reduce seating, and encourage online ordering and delivery services","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, online ordering platforms, and delivery tracking systems","People":"Customers, employees, and visitors to stores and hospitality venues","Owner":"Business owners and management"},{"Description":"Personal agency leading to variable levels of social distancing compliance","Impact":"Inconsistent interpersonal spacing leading to increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidance, signage, and education on the importance of social distancing","Technologies":"Digital signage, communication platforms, and educational campaigns","People":"General public, customers, and employees","Owner":"Government health agencies, businesses, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Increased uptake of drive-through and online ordering services","Impact":"Reduced foot traffic in stores but potential for increased exposure during delivery","Mitigation":"Implement contactless delivery, sanitization protocols, and tracking of delivery personnel","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, tracking apps, and delivery management platforms","People":"Shoppers, delivery personnel, and employees","Owner":"Retailers, delivery companies, and technology providers"}]}
